Test Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter valid username and password; 3. Click on login button.
Expected Result: User should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter invalid username and/or password; 3. Click on login button.
1. Navigate to registration page; 2. Fill in required fields; 3. Submit the form.
Expected Result: User should be registered and receive a confirmation email.

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to registration page; 2. Fill in fields with existing email; 3. Submit the form.
Expected Result: Error message indicating email already exists should be displayed.

Description: Add new property as an admin
Preconditions: User must be logged in as admin
Test Steps: 1. Go to property management; 2. Click on 'Add Property'; 3. Fill in property details; 4. Submit.
Expected Result: New property should appear in the property list.

Preconditions: User must be logged in as admin
Test Steps: 1. Go to property management; 2. Select a property to edit; 3. Update details and submit.
Expected Result: Property details should be updated successfully.

Preconditions: User must be logged in as admin
Test Steps: 1. Go to messaging section; 2. Select a tenant; 3. Compose message and send.
Expected Result: Message should be sent and appear in the conversation.

Preconditions: User must be logged in as tenant
Test Steps: 1. Log in as tenant; 2. Navigate to messages section.

Preconditions: User must be logged in as admin
User must be logged in as admin
Expected Result: List of users should be displayed.

Description: Ensure password is encrypted in the database
Test Steps: 1. Register a new user; 2. Check database for password entry.
Expected Result: Password should not be stored in plain text.

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter SQL injection payload as username.
Expected Result: System should not crash and should show an error message.
